item.title: Report X-2023091044
item.description:
Report X-2023091044

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023091044 SequenceEvent: box showed signs of internal leakage, upon opening caps were loose DescribePack: loose caps DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately place in a lined tote and taken to hazmat processing area. 2. X-2023091045 SequenceEvent: package showed signs of internal leakage and upon opening caps were loose DescribePack: loose caps DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately place in a lined tote and taken to hazmat processing area. 3. X-2023091046 SequenceEvent: Package showed signs of leakage and upon opening caps were loose DescribePack: loose caps DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: package was immediately placed in a lined tote and taken to hazmat processing area

item.title: Report X-2023090974
item.description:
Report X-2023090974

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-20T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-18
  • City: FLETCHER
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package found in trailer ripped and wet placed in a plastic tub and moved to the QA staging location. DescribePack: package was repacked in other station content was place in a plastic bag. Content leaked and damage box. new box had no hazmat label on it and the label for the first box was taped to the new one. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Moved from the QA staging location to the hazmat Cage for processing.
